revision.text:
{{Infobox Oak Item |name = Cell Battery |image = [[File:Bag_Cell_Battery_Sprite.png]] |caption = Artwork of the ''Cell Battery''. |dex = 90 |effect = More Passive Mining Energy Regen }}
La '''Batería ''' es un [[Oak Items|Objeto de Oak]].Al equiparla aumenta la cantidad de [[Underground|Energía de minado]] ganada de forma pasiva. La batería se desbloquea tras capturar 90 Pokémon únicos. == Detalles ==
{| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Level !! Effect !! Upgrade Requirement !! Upgrade Cost |- |0 || x1.5 Energy Regen Amount || 25 Mined Items || style="text-align:right" | 50,000 {{pdollar}} |- |1 || x1.6 Energy Regen Amount || 25 Mined Items || style="text-align:right" | 100,000 {{pdollar}} |- |2 || x1.7 Energy Regen Amount || 75 Mined Items || style="text-align:right" | 250,000 {{pdollar}} |- |3 || x1.8 Energy Regen Amount || 125 Mined Items || style="text-align:right" | 500,000 {{pdollar}} |- |4 || x1.9 Energy Regen Amount || 250 Mined Items || style="text-align:right" | 1,000,000 {{pdollar}} |- |5/Max || x2.0 Energy Regen Amount || N/A || style="text-align:right" | N/A |- |}

{{Objetos de Oak}}
[[Category:Oak Items|Categoría:Objetos de Oak]] [[Category:Items|Categoría:Objetos]]

revision.text:
{{Infobox Oak Item |name = Cell Battery |image = [[File:Bag_Cell_Battery_Sprite.png]] |caption = Artwork of the ''Cell Battery''. |dex = 90 |effect = More Passive Mining Energy Regen }}
The '''Cell Battery''' is a type of [[Oak Items|Oak Item]]. When equipped, it increases the amount [[Underground|Mining Energy]] passively gained. The Cell Battery is unlocked after catching 90 unique Pokémon.
== Detalles ==
{| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Level !! Effect !! Upgrade Requirement !! Upgrade Cost |- |0 || x1.5 Energy Regen Amount || 25 Mined Items || style="text-align:right" | 50,000 {{pdollar}} |- |1 || x1.6 Energy Regen Amount || 25 Mined Items || style="text-align:right" | 100,000 {{pdollar}} |- |2 || x1.7 Energy Regen Amount || 75 Mined Items || style="text-align:right" | 250,000 {{pdollar}} |- |3 || x1.8 Energy Regen Amount || 125 Mined Items || style="text-align:right" | 500,000 {{pdollar}} |- |4 || x1.9 Energy Regen Amount || 250 Mined Items || style="text-align:right" | 1,000,000 {{pdollar}} |- |5/Max || x2.0 Energy Regen Amount || N/A || style="text-align:right" | N/A |- |}
